Commands.Aura Cannon: 2-hit Holy magic BRV attack + HP attack  Extra damage to ghost types  Self: 4 turns ATK Up II
Commands.Razor Gale: Wind group magic BRV attack  Extra damage to ghost types

Artifacts.BRV Guard Up: Raises Defense Power by 10% when BRV is over 50% Max BRV
Artifacts.Mighty Aura Cannon: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Aura Cannon by 10%
Artifacts.Mighty Razor Gale: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Razor Gale by 10%

Passives.Aura Cannon Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Aura Cannon.
Passives.Spirit of Competition: Grants 100% critical hit rate when BRV equals or exceeds Initial BRV and target's BRV is over twice of that BRV.
Passives.Aura Cannon Charge: Increases the max uses of Aura Cannon by 1.
Passives.Ghost Buster: Makes BRV Attack ignore Ghosts' Melee resistance.
Passives.Razor Gale Charge: Increases the max uses of Razor Gale by 1.
Passives.Break Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Passives.BRV Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack when BRV is over 50%.
Passives.Razor Gale Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Razor Gale.
Passives.Duncan's Teachings: Slightly raises BRV damage of abilities that are at 1 use left.
Passives.Speed Buff: Moderately raises SPD with active buffs
Passives.Aura Cannon Extension: When using Aura Cannon:  Becomes 4-hit BRV attack; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage  Target: 4 turns Holy Resist DownAfter using Aura Cannon:  BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (increased damage to ghost types) for 4 turns
Passives.Buffed Attack Boost Up: Moderately raises MAX BRV, ATK with active buffs
Passives.Razor Gale Extension: When using Razor Gale:  Moderate Razor Gale boost  Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target  Target: 4 turns Wind Resist DownAfter using Razor Gale:  Triggers additional HP attack; HP damage shared

Weapons.Kaiser Knuckle CP: 15: Increases Aura cannon's potency and lowers its Action Delay.
Weapons.Burning Fist CP: 35: Increases the potency of Razor Gale.Grants Small Max BRV Up for 4 turns.
